scripts.deploy: docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml build --parallel --compress --pull && docker save ttis-redis ttis-front ttis-back | docker --tls -H test.croud.jp load && docker-compose --env-file .env-deploy -f docker/docker-compose.yml up -d
scripts.start:prod:back: yarn --cwd ttis-back build && yarn --cwd ttis-back start
scripts.start:prod:front: yarn --cwd ttis-front build && yarn --cwd ttis-front start
scripts.start:docker: docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml build --compress --parallel && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml down && docker-compose -f docker/docker-compose.yml up
